website_summaries.verdict: The Lamaston boasts a long battery life and good functionality. The mouse function is notable for its responsiveness.
pros: The keystroke response and keyboard visibility on the Lamaston is adequate for the cost
The extended battery life is longer than most virtual keyboard devices
The mouse is more intuitive to use than other low-cost options
cons: The spacing on the Lamaston's QWERTY keyboard is more modified than others, requiring a longer adjustment period for users

customer_reviews.title: Great cool 🎁
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my husband because he is constantly spilling sticky stuff into every single keyboard we own (which is a lot because he works on computers) . He was never a speed typed and was always a "key poker". So this was perfect for him. He was thrilled. Easy as cake to set up and pair, as long as you don't retry to read the awful translated directions. Just plug in, it will pair it Bluetoothly. Can only pair with one device easily. Can be switched to a difffefr not device but the translation is terrible on the instructions. But he loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Laser keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for the price. Need a flat surface plus something to put the unit up on so it can project down onto the surface.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Petrakis

customer_reviews.title: but otherwise very good for non-silent atmosphere
customer_reviews.text: Cannot turn off the chirp when typing, can't use in school, but otherwise very good for non-silent atmosphere.
customer_reviews.author: 96 Dream

customer_reviews.title: Love the idea
customer_reviews.text: As much as I tried I just can't get this to work well enough to use. Love the idea, but the implementation is just not there.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew W. Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: A Nice Virtual Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a gift for one of our grandson's who is into anything computers. He loves it though it seems to be a bit slow.
customer_reviews.author: Monty

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Now I can look way smarter than I actually am while procrastinating.
customer_reviews.author: Dacotah Blanchard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my teen son. He really likes it. Seems to work well for him.
customer_reviews.author: Mark L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: This product clicked non stop. It did not work for me. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Twana A.

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard works, Mouse issues
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard works surprisingly well, but I could not get the mouse function to work (Galaxy Note 4); it appears others have this problem too.
customer_reviews.author: Friedman Wagner-Dobler

customer_reviews.title: would be better if it could clip to the ipad and shine ...
customer_reviews.text: Got it to work on my ipad. It feels cheap but works, not really able to stand it right in from of the ipad without having to push the ipad far away from you.would be better if it could clip to the ipad and shine down form an edge.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Not so great in bright light.
customer_reviews.text: Not so great in bright light; but I found this useful in subdues lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Cato

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would be able to connect to the bluetooth on my iphone, it could not.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So cool
customer_reviews.text: Seriously cool virtual keyboard. Really works!!! I will say it works better for slower typers like myself. For someone with speedy fingers, it sometimes won't pick up a keystroke. This is a great item to get the gadget lover in your life or for the person that seems to have everything. Disclaimer: I have received heavily discounted product in exchange for a review. Each opinion is my own and is not influenced in any way by any party but myself. It is my sincere hope that my review was helpful. If it was not, then please let me know what I left out that you'd want to know. I always aim to improve.
customer_reviews.author: PositiveSerendipity

customer_reviews.title: Cool, but not the most efficient typing keyboard.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this at a discount and asked to write a review. It works as claimed. You can not type fast on this keyboard. I would say it is more something cool to show your buddies or an emergency back up to keep in your computer bag. It is small so it doesn't take up hardly any room. The battery last quite a while.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
